title: T206 Missing Red Ink Collection - total 13 cards
author: hank_jp

posts.post_title: T206 Missing Red Ink Collection - total 13 cards
posts.post_content:
T206  Missing Red Ink – among first graded examples authenticated by PSA, SGC, BVG, GAI  

Beck  SGC 30
Ferguson  GAI 3
Fromme Cincinnati  SGC 20
Gilbert St Louis  raw
Lindaman  PSA 2
Niles  PSA 3
Ritchey  BVG 3  (no red on belt but not mentioned on flip)
Rucker Brooklyn  GAI 1.5  (Questionable, although “No B” on label – paper loss on back)
Speaker  GAI  A
Stahl  GAI  3.5
Starr SGC 55
Sweeney  PSA 2
Wagner bat left shoulder  PSA 1

Most of these cards have POP of 1-5 cards that have been authenticated
    Total of 13 cards:   $8995
For those interested in seeing scans, please email me at: [url]henryjlevy@yahoo.com[/url]
